name: tempo-tools
description: Tools for interacting with Tempo for management & reporting

scripts.ops:gcloud:config: gcloud config set compute/zone us-central1-a; gcloud config set compute/region us-central; gcloud config set project gunio-tools
scripts.ops:gcloud:connect: gcloud config configurations activate gunio-tools && gcloud auth configure-docker
scripts.ops:gcloud:setup: gcloud config configurations create gunio-tools && gcloud auth login && npm run ops:gcloud:config
scripts.publish:slackHandler: gcloud alpha functions deploy tempo-tools-slack-command --entry-point slackCommands --runtime nodejs10 --vpc-connector static-egress --egress-settings all --trigger-http
scripts.publish:pubsubHandler: gcloud alpha functions deploy tempo-tools-event-handler --entry-point pubsubHandler --runtime nodejs10 --vpc-connector static-egress --egress-settings all --trigger-topic tempo-tools
scripts.publish: npm run publish:slackHandler && npm run publish:pubsubHandler

author: Danny Graham <good.midget@gmail.com>
